concepts.name: Product-Market Fit
concepts.quote: PMF is insufficient‚Äîyou need product-market-channel fit. 40-50% of customers should come organically

concepts.name: Retention
concepts.quote: Focus on retention before growth. Don't hire a growth team until you have strong retention

concepts.name: Growth Teams
concepts.quote: Founder-led growth is essential. The longer you wait to hire growth, the better

concepts.name: Jobs to Be Done
concepts.quote: It's context and outcome, not pain and gain. People hire products to make progress

concepts.name: Strategy vs Execution
concepts.quote: Most execution problems are really strategy problems. Fix the strategy first

concepts.name: Pre-Mortems
concepts.quote: Imagine this project has failed‚Äîwhat went wrong? If done right, you won't need an ugly post-mortem

concepts.name: LNO Framework
concepts.quote: Leverage tasks return 10-100x, Neutral 1x, Overhead less. Not all tasks are equal

concepts.name: Rebrands & Redesigns
concepts.quote: Never once have I seen a rebrand produce good results. It's always a 3-6 month setback

concepts.name: Customer Interviews
concepts.quote: Interview people who recently BOUGHT, not who WANT to. Study what they did, not what they say

concepts.name: Independent Decision Making
concepts.quote: Best decisions happen when people submit judgment independently before meetings

concepts.name: Opportunity Cost
concepts.quote: Ask 'Is this the BEST use of time?' not 'Is this GOOD?' Optimize for opportunity cost, not ROI

concepts.name: Shortening Feedback Loops
concepts.quote: You don't have long feedback loops‚Äîyou're choosing not to shorten them. Find leading indicators

concepts.name: Founder-Led Growth
concepts.quote: Don't hire growth until $1-5M ARR minimum. Founders must figure out growth first

concepts.name: Zero Interest Rate PM
concepts.quote: Every new PM acts like they work at Google with infinite resources. Ship to learn, not research forever

concepts.name: Positioning
concepts.quote: Positioning defines how you win. It's not fluff‚Äîit's how you're best in the world at delivering value

concepts.name: Growth Channels
concepts.quote: If 90% comes from paid channels, the music eventually stops. Build owned channels

concepts.name: In the Details Leadership
concepts.quote: Lead by being in the details, not by delegating. Leaders who don't understand can't judge quality

concepts.name: OKRs
concepts.quote: Don't start with OKRs. Start with mission ‚Üí strategy ‚Üí product strategy ‚Üí roadmap ‚Üí goals

concepts.name: Small Teams
concepts.quote: 5 teams doing one thing beats 1 team doing 5 things. Small focused teams outperform

concepts.name: Thinking Big
concepts.quote: At Google, if it wasn't $100M+ revenue, it wasn't worth discussing. Think bigger

concepts.name: Network Effects
concepts.quote: Network effects + core product differentiation creates staying power

concepts.name: Activation
concepts.quote: Make them think less, not click less. Cognitive load matters more than number of clicks

concepts.name: Product-Led Growth
concepts.quote: If product handles acquisition, activation, monetization or retention, growth matters early

concepts.name: Data-Driven Decisions
concepts.quote: Growth cannot function without data. If you have 10 customers, that's a spreadsheet, not data

concepts.name: Speed of Execution
concepts.quote: If you went a quarter without shipping, something is deeply wrong. You can't improve without feedback

concepts.name: When to Quit
concepts.quote: If you're thinking about quitting, you're already too late. Optimal quit point was 3-6 months earlier

concepts.name: Career Growth
concepts.quote: Proximity to impact beats proximity to power. Optimize for learning, not status

concepts.name: Product Craft
concepts.quote: Taste is a competitive advantage‚Äîand it's learnable. Obsess over the details

concepts.name: Pricing Strategy
concepts.quote: Pricing is a reflection of value. Get positioning right first, then pricing becomes clearer

concepts.name: Hiring Philosophy
concepts.quote: Give real scenarios from the role. Don't care about practiced answers. See them do the job

concepts.name: Context + Outcome
concepts.quote: It's not pain and gain, it's context and outcomes. The context makes the irrational rational

concepts.name: Experimentation
concepts.quote: If every initiative is an experiment, that's paralysis. Not everything deserves A/B testing

concepts.name: Customer-Centric
concepts.quote: Long-term success is measured by value created for customers, not revenue or growth metrics

concepts.name: Virality
concepts.quote: Build earned/owned channels, not just paid. Earned channels create defensible growth loops

concepts.name: Monetization
concepts.quote: If product monetizes, growth comes sooner. If sales closes, growth is less critical early

concepts.name: Learning from Competition
concepts.quote: Know what competition is doing, be inspired, but don't blindly copy. Context matters

concepts.name: User Research
concepts.quote: The fastest way to learn is often to ship, not do extensive research. Ship to learn

concepts.name: Roadmaps
concepts.quote: Instead of features, talk about struggling moments. That's the seed for real innovation

concepts.name: Curious Disagreement
concepts.quote: When someone thinks something crazy wrong, respond 'Fascinating, you have to tell me more why you think that.' Curiosity in moments of challenge can completely tear down walls.

concepts.name: Dinosaur Brain
concepts.quote: Executives have a little brontosaurus brain and can only hold three facts at once. Make a recommendation‚Äîdon't dump information.

concepts.name: Hill Climb
concepts.quote: The hill climb is about local optimum vs. global optimum. Climbing down into the valley to reach the mountain is worth it‚Äîremember what the summit feels like.

concepts.name: Onboarding Leverage
concepts.quote: Onboarding is the only part of your product 100% of people touch. It's your first chance to deliver on the promise your brand made.

concepts.name: PMF for Candidates
concepts.quote: People, mission, and financials. Evaluate companies on these three criteria before joining, and don't settle for two out of three.

concepts.name: Boring is Good
concepts.quote: Fish where the fish are. Find a small fishing hole with lots of fish and little competition‚Äîboring businesses often win.

concepts.name: Lazy Leadership
concepts.quote: Get away from the things you hate as quickly as possible. Be Teflon for tasks. If it scales, you won't touch a pressure washer.

concepts.name: People Problems
concepts.quote: There are no problems, only people problems. If I ever think 'should I fire this person' even once, I should fire them immediately.

concepts.name: Mental Health First
concepts.quote: If your sleep, relationships, or physical health is suffering, your body is telling you to stop. Something needs to change.

concepts.name: Four Steps of Transformation
concepts.quote: Suffer. Seek truth for your suffering. Practice self-compassion. Extend compassion to others. That's the four-step cycle of deep transformation.

concepts.name: New Distribution Platforms
concepts.quote: New distribution platforms follow a four-step cycle: conditions met, moat identified, platform opens, platform closes. ChatGPT is next.

concepts.name: Escape Velocity
concepts.quote: Startups is a game of getting distribution before the incumbent can copy. There is no opting out‚Äîyou have to play the game.

concepts.name: Hard Constraints
concepts.quote: The companies making real AI transformation progress set hard constraints‚Äîlike team sizes at one-fifth the benchmark or no new headcount without proving AI can't do it.

concepts.name: Agents Over Apps
concepts.quote: The whole market is going towards agents and outcome-based pricing. Software is going from helping individuals to accomplishing jobs autonomously.

concepts.name: Outcome-Based Pricing
concepts.quote: Agents need to be autonomous and outcomes measurable. We charge per resolution, not per token‚Äîaligning our success with customer success.

concepts.name: Most Impactful Thing
concepts.quote: Wake up every morning asking: What is the most impactful thing I could do today? Don't conform the job to what you like‚Äîconform to what's needed.

concepts.name: Incorrect Storytelling
concepts.quote: The danger for founders is incorrect storytelling. If you tell yourself the wrong reason why you lost, you'll fix the wrong problem.

concepts.name: Systems Thinking
concepts.quote: Computer science teaches systems thinking. As AI writes code, operating the code-generating machine will require even more sophisticated systems thinking.

concepts.name: Flexible Identity
concepts.quote: Have a flexible view of your identity. To build something significant, transform into what the company needs you to be at that point.

concepts.name: Toddler Soccer
concepts.quote: When everyone chases the same metric, you get toddler soccer‚Äîeveryone trips over each other. Detangle goals so each team has a different metric that ladders up.
